title: Palestinians in Israel cite threats, firings and discrimination after Oct. 7
description: At least 20% of Israelis identify as Arab or Palestinian. Many say they have long felt like second-class citizens. The current war has worsened their position in the country, they say.

title: A fan died of heat at a Taylor Swift concert. It's a rising risk with climate change
description: The concert in Rio de Janeiro took place during one of the worst heat waves ever in Brazil. The country is in the middle of a record-breaking six months of extreme weather.

title: Musk's X sues Media Matters over its report on ads next to hate groups' posts
description: Elon Musk's social media company X, formerly called Twitter, filed a lawsuit against the liberal advocacy group Media Matters for America on Monday.

title: U.S. Navy plane overshoots runway and goes into a bay in Hawaii, military says
description: The P8-A aircraft overshot the runway at a Marine base on Kaneohe Bay, officials said. Further information, including any details on injuries, was not made available.
